articles.title: DOJ antitrust cop hammers ‘whack-a-mole’ approach to reining in Big Tech
articles.content: The U.S. Justice Department’s top antitrust cop said he wants to “unplug” monopolistic Big Tech firms and drove home his support for a stalled congressional bill intended to rein in Google, Amazon, Meta and Apple during a fiery speech on Friday.

articles.title: The Meta meltdown: This chart shows Facebook's fall from grace among the most valuable U.S. companies
articles.content: Dogged by competitive and macroeconomic threats, Meta Platforms Inc. is sinking down the ranks of the largest U.S. companies.
